# Subtle - llms.txt

## About
Subtle explores the future of work when intelligence is commoditized, software supply grows, and individuals outperform teams. This is a blog covering insights on AI, LLMs, modern development, and the changing landscape of knowledge work.

## Site Information
- URL: https://www.subtle.so/
- Description: Subtle explores the future of work when intelligence is commoditized, software supply grows, and individuals outperform teams. Read our insights on AI, LLMs, and modern development.
- Sitemap: https://www.subtle.so/sitemap.xml

## Key Pages
- Homepage: https://www.subtle.so/
- Start Here: https://www.subtle.so/start-here.html
- Services: https://www.subtle.so/services.html

## Topics Covered
- AI and LLM development
- Software development and tooling
- Future of work and knowledge work
- Product management and product-market fit
- Startup ideas and entrepreneurship
- Pricing and business models
- AI agents and automation
- Creative tools and design
- Developer tools (Cursor, Windsurf, etc.)

## Recent Posts (as of 2025)
- Composer-1 is the model of the year
- Agentic equities
- Prototype production last mile problem
- Flow state R&D
- Gemini 2.5 first impressions
- Notes on using O3
- And many more...

## Structure
This site is a static HTML blog with individual posts as HTML files. Each post is self-contained and includes metadata for SEO and social sharing.

## Contact
For comments, issues, or contributions, see the repository at the source code location.
